com.gcu.business

Interface RecipeBusinessInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    RecipeBusinessService

    public interface RecipeBusinessInterface
    This is the business service for the Recipe model, all the logic that connects the controller and the database is used in here.
    Author:
    Hermes Mimini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int addRecipe(Recipe recipe, int userID)
      This method will take in a recipe object and will add it to the database, after the recipe is added it will return a Boolean.
      int deleteRecipe(Recipe recipe)
      This method will delete the recipe that is sent to it, it will grab the recipe ID and use the dataService to delete the recipe.
      int editRecipe(Recipe recipe, int id)
      This method will update the content of the recipe by using the recipeDataService.
      Recipe findRecipeById(int id)
      This method will prompt the database for a recipe, by using the recipeID as a parameter.
      Recipe findRecipeByObject(Recipe recipe)
      This method will prompt the database for a recipe, by using the object model as a parameter.
      java.util.List<Recipe> getRecipes()
      This method will utilize the recipeDataService and return a list of all the recipes in the database.
      java.util.List<Recipe> getUserRecipes(int ID)
      This method will utilize the recipeDataService and return a list of recipes in the database that are unique to the user that is calling it.

    • Method Detail

      • getRecipes

        java.util.List<Recipe> getRecipes()
        This method will utilize the recipeDataService and return a list of all the recipes in the database.
        Returns:
        list - List(Type Recipe) Class

      • getUserRecipes

        java.util.List<Recipe> getUserRecipes(int ID)
        This method will utilize the recipeDataService and return a list of recipes in the database that are unique to the user that is calling it.
        Parameters:
        ID - - The ID of the Users Recipes grabbed
        Returns:
        list - List(Type Recipe) Class (List of all recipes in the database.)

      • addRecipe

        int addRecipe(Recipe recipe,
              int userID)
        This method will take in a recipe object and will add it to the database, after the recipe is added it will return a Boolean.
        Parameters:
        recipe - - Recipe Class (Recipe that will be added to the database.)
        userID - The foreign key of the user.
        Returns:
        Boolean Class - (Boolean value depending on the result of the dataService.)

      • deleteRecipe

        int deleteRecipe(Recipe recipe)
        This method will delete the recipe that is sent to it, it will grab the recipe ID and use the dataService to delete the recipe. Once complete a boolean object is going to be returned.
        Parameters:
        recipe - - Recipe Class (Recipe that will be removed from the database.)
        Returns:
        Boolean Class - (Boolean value depending on the result of the dataService.)

      • editRecipe

        int editRecipe(Recipe recipe,
               int id)
        This method will update the content of the recipe by using the recipeDataService.
        Parameters:
        recipe - - Recipe Class (Recipe that will be updated in the database.)
        id - - The foreign key.
        Returns:
        Boolean Class - (Boolean value depending on the result of the dataService.)

      • findRecipeByObject

        Recipe findRecipeByObject(Recipe recipe)
        This method will prompt the database for a recipe, by using the object model as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        recipe - - Recipe Class
        Returns:
        Recipe Class
